VIII.i.2.C.1.l
.
Annotating an Award of Retroactive Benefits Under the Nehmer Court Order
After generating an award of retroactive benefits under the
Nehmer
court order, claims processors must enter
Nehmer retroactive payment based
in the
Remarks
section of the award print (in the Veterans Service Network), or
PRINT REMARKS dialog box (in the Veterans Benefits Management System - Awards).
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Authorization Under the Nehmer Stipulation
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
